name: Dollar Coin
description: Dollar Coin ($DC) is a community-driven meme project born out of satire â€” but backed by a powerful truth: fiat currency is broken. With over 40% of all USD printed in the last few years, inflation has become a global joke. Dollar Coin flips that joke on its head. What started as a meme from Pump.fun has become a movement to decentralize the dollar, mock the system that endlessly prints money, and create the most viral, narrative-backed digital dollar on-chain.
